title: found a booster, how do I report him
body: Ok a booster added me cause we're in the same league, (silver 1 don't hate on me) i asked him how he found me, he said he was a booster n stuff, I have screenshots of him telling me he can boost me but I don't know how to report this to the correct people. I've tried http://support.leagueoflegends.com but I can't navigate that s**t being the silver monkey I am. Pls help, wanna make the rift a better place ;-;

replies.body:
File a ticket for that game. Also download your replay and send it to them as an attachment. It should have all the data they need to pull the logs from that game (logs aren't just chat logs, they are also containing addresses and IDs that can help start up an investigation.)

Your replay folder is accessible from the Replay menu in the client.
problem is it wasn't in a game :/ he privately messaged me in the client

Oh! Even better!

That gets instant action because its an act specifically outlined in ToU they are violating.

Send a ticket through support.

You have to choose the option as follows (I gave you links to photos for a visual aid. View them, don't download):

"I want to report abusive behavior, cheating, or a malicious link."

The other typing fields should appear. In the 'What would you like to report' field, Boosting is a selection you can make.

Fill the rest in and thank you very much for helping League be better.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Ayyyyy it worked a charm, thanks for all you're help, one more boosting account off the streets  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Glad you got this worked out so quickly! In the future, make sure you report them in the post game (if it's during a match), and simply shoot us any direct message screenshots you have in a ticket ^_^.
